title: How Does Black Hole 250 Million Light Years Away Sound? NASA Releases Audio
content: Acoustic waves coming out of the black hole at the heart of the Perseus cluster of galaxies were transposed up 57 and 58 octaves in order to make them audible for human ears.
summary: Acoustic waves coming out of the black hole at the heart of the Perseus cluster of galaxies were transposed up 57 and 58 octaves in order to make them audible for human ears.

title: Wayanad To Oslo: Who Is Rinson Jose, Businessman Linked To Pager Blasts?
content: Rinson Jose, an Indian emigrant to Norway, has been linked to the Hezbollah pager blasts in Lebanon, which killed 12 people. Reports have suggested that Norta Global, a Bulgaria-based company owned by him, had a role in supplying the pagers.
summary: Rinson Jose, an Indian emigrant to Norway, has been linked to the Hezbollah pager blasts in Lebanon, which killed 12 people. Reports have suggested that Norta Global, a Bulgaria-based company owned by him, had a role in supplying the pagers.

title: Fighting Brazil Ban, Elon Musk's X Names Legal Representative
content: Brazilian law requires foreign companies to name a legal representative to operate in the country. The representative would assume the legal responsibilities for the firm locally.
summary: Brazilian law requires foreign companies to name a legal representative to operate in the country. The representative would assume the legal responsibilities for the firm locally.

title: Kerala-Born Man's Name Comes Up In Pager Blasts Case. What Probe Reveals
content: The name of an Indian emigrant to Norway has cropped up in the investigation into the pager blasts aimed at Hezbollah operatives, which killed 12 people in Lebanon and left thousands injured.
summary: The name of an Indian emigrant to Norway has cropped up in the investigation into the pager blasts aimed at Hezbollah operatives, which killed 12 people in Lebanon and left thousands injured.

title: How CIA, Mossad Used A Computer Virus To Dismantle Iran's Nuclear Program
content: The story of Stuxnet's development and deployment began years earlier. The inception of Stuxnet can be traced back to the early 2000s, during a period of heightened tension between Iran and Western nations over Iran's nuclear ambitions.
summary: The story of Stuxnet's development and deployment began years earlier. The inception of Stuxnet can be traced back to the early 2000s, during a period of heightened tension between Iran and Western nations over Iran's nuclear ambitions.

title: China's "Beautiful Governor" Jailed Over Affairs With Subordinates, Bribes
content: A female official in China has been sentenced to 13 years in prison and fined one million yuan (approximately Rs 1.18 crore) for misconduct.
summary: A female official in China has been sentenced to 13 years in prison and fined one million yuan (approximately Rs 1.18 crore) for misconduct.

title: Who Was Ibrahim Aqil, Top Hezbollah Military Commander Killed In Beirut
content: Israel on Friday said that it killed Ibrahim Aqil, the top commander of Hezbollah, in a strike in the Iran-backed group's stronghold in Beirut.

title: Hezbollah And Hamas Leaders Assassinated So Far
content: Israel killed a top Hezbollah commander in an airstrike on Beirut's southern suburbs on Friday, the Israeli military and security sources in Lebanon said, escalating a year-long conflict between Israel and the Iran-backed group.
summary: Israel killed a top Hezbollah commander in an airstrike on Beirut's southern suburbs on Friday, the Israeli military and security sources in Lebanon said, escalating a year-long conflict between Israel and the Iran-backed group.

title: Secret Service Found Guilty For Security Failure In Trump Assassination Bid
content: A new report has shown that the US Secret Service is responsible for security failures in the assassination attempt against former President Donald Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania on July 13, which led to one death and multiple injuries.
summary: A new report has shown that the US Secret Service is responsible for security failures in the assassination attempt against former President Donald Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania on July 13, which led to one death and multiple injuries.

title: Over 100 Killed, Missing As Drug Traffickers Clash In Mexico's Sinaloa

title: 7 Languages, PhD In Particle Physics: Woman Linked To Exploding Pagers

title: Hezbollah Commander, Carrying $7 Million Bounty, Killed In Beirut Strike
content: Israel announced Friday that it killed Ibrahim Aqil, commander of Hezbollah's elite Radwan Force, in a precision airstrike on Beirut. The attack targeted a meeting of senior commanders, killing at least 14 people, including 10 high-ranking officials.

title: Suspected Trump Assassination Plotter Has Criminal History

title: UN Security Council Meets In Emergency Session Over Lebanon
content: The UN Security Council has met in an emergency session on Lebanon, following an uptick in cross-border fire between Hezbollah and Israeli forces, and deadly wireless device explosions targeting members of the militant group.

title: Hezbollah Confirms Senior Commander Killed In Israeli Airstrike
content: Lebanon's Hezbollah on Friday night mourned the acting commander of its Elite Radwan Force, Ibrahim Akil, who was killed earlier in the day by an Israeli airstrike on Beirut's southern suburbs.
summary: Lebanon's Hezbollah on Friday night mourned the acting commander of its Elite Radwan Force, Ibrahim Akil, who was killed earlier in the day by an Israeli airstrike on Beirut's southern suburbs.
